data.title: generasia
data.text:
Hyeri (혜리) is a South Korean singer and actress under Sublime Artist Agency. She is a member of the Korean Pop girl group Girl's Day. She joined the group in September 2010.

Profile

Stage Name: Hyeri (혜리)

Birth Name: Lee Hyeri (이혜리)

Birthdate: June 9, 1994 (1994-06-09) (age 30)

Birthplace: Gwangju, South Korea

Blood Type: AB

Height: 167cm

Weight: 51.7kg

Education:

GongYeon Girls High School

School of Performing Arts Seoul (SOPA) (Graduated)

Konkuk University

Hobby: Watching movies and reading a book

Specialty: Marathon and Writing

Relationships:

H.O.T.'s Tony An (2013)

Ryu Jun Yeol (2017–2023)

Group:

Girl's Day (2010–)

Labels:

DreamT Entertainment (2010–2019)

Creative Group ING (2019–2024)

Sublime Artist Agency (2024–)
